Title: Reverse engineering safeguards
Description: Implement safeguards against reverse engineering of sensitive training data from synthetic datasets.

Evidence.Evidence Artifact Example: Technical documentation and test reports demonstrating the implementation of safeguards against reverse engineering. This may include descriptions of applied privacy-preserving techniques (e.g. differential privacy, noise injection, data minimization), results of re-identification risk assessments, and validation tests confirming that original training data cannot be reconstructed.
